org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.service.banner

Class BannerDegreeProgressDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.portlet.courses.degreeprogress.service.banner.BannerDegreeProgressDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDegreeProgressDao

    public class BannerDegreeProgressDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDegreeProgressDao
    Extracts the user's degree progress information. An implementation of the degree progress DAO.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-02-07
    Author:
    Aaron Grant

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  BannerDegreeProgressDaoImpl.AreasExtractor
      Extracts information about areas, which are the general requirements for a subset of courses to create a report.
      protected class  BannerDegreeProgressDaoImpl.ProgramExtractor
      Extracts program data from the database to set values on the degree progress report.
      protected class  BannerDegreeProgressDaoImpl.ProgressReportExtractor
      Extracts information about the user's Degree Progress Report.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String AREAS_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding the user's GPA and credit information to be queried from the database
      private static java.lang.String CTLG_TERM_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding the user's catalog term information to be queried from the database

      Represents a physical data source
      private java.lang.String DEPARTMENT_FOR_MAJOR_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding the user's major and department information to be queried from the database
      private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate
      Used to query the database for user detail information
      private IBannerPidmDao pidmDao
      The PIDM DAO interface (The PIDM is an identifier unique to the user)
      private static java.lang.String PROGRAM_RULE_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding the curriculum rules to be queried from the database
      private static java.lang.String PROGRAM_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding the user's program information to be queried from the database
      private static java.lang.String REPORT_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding the user's required courses information to be queried from the database
      private static java.lang.String TERM_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding the user's selected term information to be queried from the database
      private java.lang.String WEB_ENABLED_SQL
      Holds the static SQL regarding whether or not the program code can be displayed on the web

      • getProgressReport

        public DegreeProgressReport getProgressReport(PortletRequest request)
                                       throws BannnerDoCappException
        Generates a degree progress report for the user.
        Specified by:
        getProgressReport in interface IDegreeProgressDao
        Parameters:
        request - A PortletRequest which holds information on how to further render the portlet
        Returns:
        A DegreeProgressReport which contains information such as GPA, credit totals and major requirements
        Throws:
        BannnerDoCappException - The do_capp process failed to complete
